error.message: The function writeSummaryReports is too long. The maximum length is 20.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
The function historyChart is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function apply is too long. The maximum length is 20.
Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
